channel.title: Receptor Kinase on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Receptor Kinase on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaCKR5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA02g17820 Gene Symbol: CaCKR5 Gene Name: cysteine-rich receptor-like protein kinase Genome: cultivar CM334 genome Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A cysteine-rich receptor-like protein kinase CaCKR5 modulates immune response against Ralstonia solanacearum infection in pepper.

item.title: CaLecRK-S.5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA04g04250 Gene Symbol: CaLecRK-S.5 Gene Name: lectin receptor kinase Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaLecRK-S.

item.title: CaLRR-RLK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaLRR-RLK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaLRR-RLK1, a novel RD receptor-like kinase from Capsicum annuum and transcriptionally activated by CaHDZ27, act as positive regulator in Ralstonia solanacearum resistance.

item.title: ChSK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb124060 Gene Symbol: ChSK1 Gene Name: Cochliobolus heterostrophus Susceptibility Kinase 1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: Cr4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb406780 Gene Symbol: Cr4 Gene Name: crinkly4 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CsExo70B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_1G036490.1 Gene Symbol: CsExo70B Gene Name: exocytosis subunit Exo70B Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Our work reveals a regulatory mechanism that CsExo70B promotes both fruit elongation and disease resistance by maintaining appropriate RK levels at the PM.

item.title: CsTM
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G056960 Gene Symbol: CsTM Gene Name: trichome morphology Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The CsTM alters multicellular trichome morphology and enhances resistance against aphid by interacting with CsTIP1;1 in cucumber.

item.title: CsWAKL08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs9g14540 Gene Symbol: CsWAKL08 Gene Name: Wall-associated receptor-like kinase 8 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsWAKL08, a pathogen-induced wall-associated receptor-like kinase in sweet orange, confers resistance to citrus bacterial canker via ROS control and JA signaling.

item.title: FaRIPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaRIPK1 Gene Name: red-initial protein kinase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Silencing FaRIPK1 expression by VIGS affects ripening-related processes and corresponding gene expression.

item.title: Fir1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc12g099830 Gene Symbol: Fir1 Gene Name: Fls2/Fls3-interacting receptor-like cytoplasmic kinase 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Identified the tomato Fls2/Fls3-interacting receptor-like cytoplasmic kinase 1 (Fir1) protein that is involved in PTI triggered by flagellin perception.

item.title: GmBIR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G079200 Gene Symbol: GmBIR1 Gene Name: BAK1-INTERACTING RECEPTOR LIKE KINASE1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean immune receptor GmBIR1 regulates host transcriptome, spliceome, and immunity during cyst nematode infection.

item.title: GmMLRK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G122000 Gene Symbol: GmMLRK1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A novel soybean malectin-like receptor kinase-encoding gene, GmMLRK1, provides resistance to soybean mosaic virus.

item.title: LePRK1

item.title: LePRK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LePRK2 Gene Name: receptor-like protein kinase2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The Pollen Receptor Kinase LePRK2 Mediates Growth-Promoting Signals and Positively Regulates Pollen Germination and Tube Growth.

item.title: RLPK4-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU2Hr1G111760.1 Gene Symbol: RLPK4-1 Gene Name: Receptor-like protein kinase 4 Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Two Receptor-like kinase 4 (RLPK4) v1 or Receptor-like kinase (RLK) v3 could be the candidates for enhanced germination under salinity stress because of their upregulated expression in salt-tolerant variety CM72.
